animeTitle: I Have a New Identity Weekly
otherNames: I Have a New Identity Weekly, I Have a New Identity Every Week, Tengo Una Nueva Identidad Cada Semana, Urban: I Have a New Identity Weekly, Wǒ Měi Zhōu Yīgè Xīn Shēnfèn, ジョブ体験システムでどん底から成り上がる, 我每周一个新身份
synopsis: Activate the Ultimate Identity System, receiving a new persona every week. Some people may appear as ordinary students on the surface, but secretly they are chairpersons of multinational corporations, unparalleled divine doctors, world-renowned chefs driving the world crazy, top global assassins, or mesmerizing hypnotists. In short, they possess countless identities.
